message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that will bring you immense value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay up to $10000 for it. Would you consider adjusting the price accordingly?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $10000 is your top limit, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11500. It's a fair price considering the value it brings, and I think it's a great compromise. What do you think?
